column2: Sriracha Factory Tour @ Huy Fong Foods
Sriracha Tour! At Huy Fong Foods
Never thought I'd visit a Sriracha factory
Fun Tour of Sriracha Sauce Factory
Homage to the Sriracha sauce we all love
Nice way to spend a couple of hours.
If you love Sriracha this place is a must to visit!
A EXCELLENT TOUR FOR OUT OF TOWN GUESTS OR FRIENDS EVEN!
A very interesting look into a working commercial food processing plant.
Fun free tour during the chili grinding season- seed to sauce!
Huge building, great tour, fun guide.
Interesting Way to Spend an Afternoon
Excellent and different - great way to spend an afternoon
tour was a bit average. Still do this tour!
